Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <mistamista> @jimboscott That's awesome! May I ask what computer you're using to get such a high CPU hashrate?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <jimboscott> I have mining rigs (3), a laptop, desktops (3) and a 'skeleton' AMD Ryzen sitting out in 'breadboard' fashion.   There are 3 newer i7's doing about 200 each.  An i7 laptop at 120.  An i3 doing 70.  An i5 pulling 150 and the Ryzen is doing 420.  My old desktop has two cores from an older i7 running a paltry 30.  Total is closer to 1.4 Gh actually.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <Gmoney> can someone confirm that I can reinstall Agama on a new build and just replace.... the wallet.dat? or the whole Komodo folder? or?????

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <jimboscott> I have done that.  Extract and run to create the folders but shut it down before it takes forever to sync.  I keep separate wallet.dat files but you can avoid the sync time by moving block data from a synced install.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <jimboscott> And I have moved a wallet from one box to another.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <Gmoney> @jimboscott am I just replacing the wallet.da =t or the whole folder on the new install?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <jimboscott> If you replace the whole folder then you will not have to sync from the start...  that is really the value as I see it.  Nobody is going to be getting so many rewards that they cannot import them one at a time by hand.  I am running 1.4 Gh here and move about 2-5 per day.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <jimboscott> I would let each machine have its own wallet.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <jimboscott> But import to a central wallet on a known schedule.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <jimboscott> ONE privkey at a time.   Trying to use the 'import multiple private keys' on .0.3.8 or .0.3.9 does NOT work and it actually makes importing that particular private key impossible.   I had to restore my wallet today before I could import them one at a time.   The wallet THINKS the multiple priv keys were imported and when you fail to see the transactions, importing them one at a time does not work either.   Just don't try it.
